song.englishname: Anyone Can Dig a Hole But It Takes a Real Man to Call It Home

english.segment1: I'm no leader I'm just a mess. It's not the way it's supposed to be. It's just the way that it is
english.segment2: I'm afraid we are all victims here. And the one whose in charge. I've lead us all astray again
english.segment3: Oh, how the plot thickens!. Are we too far gone?. Are we too far gone?. We always assume the worst. We always assume the worst
english.segment4: I'm afraid no ones listening anymore. I'm freaking out. I'm so sick. I'm making me sick. Don't look down. Don't look down
english.segment5: The only thing in my way is myself. I'm just thinking out loud. I'm just thinking. How can I still be alive. I shoulda been gone so long, so long ago
english.segment6: I can't get away from it all. I messed up like I always do. I gave you nothing. I took you nowhere. You're still listening
english.segment7: I gave you nothing. I took you nowhere. You're still listening
english.segment8: The world around me. Has taken a turn for the worst. I'm left alone. Climbing to the top
english.segment9: Should I jump should I stay. Can I make another day. Should I jump should I stay
english.segment10: I am the one whose wrong [x4]. God forgive me.
